wikispeech-sdc-record: Label for button that starts recording on the Record special page.
wikispeech-sdc-save: Label for button that saves recording on the Record special page.
wikispeech-sdc-skip:
Label for button that skips and discards recording on the Record special page.
{{identical|Skip}}
wikispeech-sdc-status-starting: Status message when the recorder is starting up and not yet ready to start recording.
wikispeech-sdc-status-ready: Status message when the recorder is ready to start recording.
wikispeech-sdc-status-listening: Status message when the recorder is waiting for user to start speaking.
wikispeech-sdc-status-recording: Status message when the recorder is recording.
